Comment 2: 
FWIW, I have seen this cause a crash in misc/cgo/test without my CL, but only rarely,
because there is a defer C.dlclose in one of the tests, and its return value (an int) is
uninitialized but scanned as if a pointer. Occasionally it is 2.

The CL crash is much nicer, since it is 100% repeatable.
